title: Rule for Take-Off
description: Dr. Sharon Cadiz is the CEO and originator of 747 Seminars. She is a dynamic leader in the field of human services and utilizes her years of experience in the fields of child development, addiction treatment, mental health, domestic violence, interpersonal trauma, cultural competence and life skills development to inform her efforts to counterbalance the effects of many common problems that stifle individuals and groups. Dr. Cadiz uses a simple technology to awaken those who sleep-walk through their days; creating lives, organizations and settings that are stuck and unable to launch plans for better results.
author: Sharon Cadiz
